name: Don't Bite Me Bro!
description:
Don't Bite Me Bro! is an open-world zombie apocalypse game with local co-op for up to four players. Explore the world for resources to build and upgrade your shelter, then defend it from constant waves of zombies. Find and save survivors to unlock them as playable characters with unique traits and abilities. Fight through randomly generated dungeons and try to stop the zombie plague before you're overrun!

1-4 players
475MB minimum save size

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy).
